titleStmt.title: Four sermons publickly delivered at several times in Ecclesfeild Church in Yorke-shire By Immanuel Knutton preacher of Gods word there.
titleStmt.author: Knutton, Immanuel, d. 1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for George Sawbridge, at the Bible on Ludgate-hill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
